remarks: Closure of closed subspace meet for ` DVecH ` vector space. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-2014.)
statement:
dihmeetcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihmeetcl.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihmeetcl $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. ran I /\ Y e. ran I ) ) -> ( X i^i Y ) e. ran I ) $.
